name: apporve invoice
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

code.name: bot_command_v2
code.description: New Chargebee Approve invoice command to Slack Workbot

properties.label: Customer ID
properties.hint: Identifier of the customer for which this invoice needs to be created. Should be specified if subscription_id is not specified.
properties.name: customer_id

properties.label: Subscription ID
properties.hint: Identifier of the subscription for which this invoice needs to be created. Should be specified if customer_id is not specified.(not applicable for consolidated invoice).
properties.name: subscription_id

properties.label: Auto collection
properties.hint: Whether payments needs to be collected automatically for this customer.
properties.name: auto_collection

properties.label: Token ID
properties.hint: Token generated by Chargebee JS representing payment method details.
properties.name: token_id

properties.label: Authorization transaction ID
properties.hint: Authorization transaction to be captured.
properties.name: authorization_transaction_id

properties.label: Payment source ID
properties.hint: Payment source to be used for this payment.
properties.name: payment_source_id

properties.label: Currency code
properties.hint: The currency code (ISO 4217 format) of the invoice amount. Required if Multicurrency is enabled
properties.name: currency_code

toggle_field.name: remove_general_note
toggle_field.label: Remove general note
toggle_field.hint: Accepted values are true or false

toggle_field.name: replace_primary_payment_source
toggle_field.label: Replace primary payment source
toggle_field.hint: Accepted values are true or false

toggle_field.name: retain_payment_source
toggle_field.label: Retain payment source
toggle_field.hint: Accepted values are true or false

properties.label: Validation status

toggle_field.name: validation_status
toggle_field.label: Customer type
toggle_field.hint: Allowed vaalues are: not_validated, valid, partially_valid, invalid

properties.hint: The address verification status.
properties.name: validation_status

properties.label: Payment intent ID
properties.hint: Payment intent ID generated by Chargebee.js
properties.name: id

properties.label: Gateway account ID
properties.hint: Gateway account used for performing the 3DS flow.
properties.name: gateway_account_id

properties.label: Gateway token
properties.hint: Identifier for 3DS transaction/verification object at the gateway.
properties.name: gw_token

properties.label: Reference ID
properties.hint: Identifier for Braintree permanent token. Applicable when you are using Braintree APIs for completing the 3DS flow.
properties.name: reference_id

properties.label: Additional information
properties.hint: Pass a stringified JSON. For E.g: click <a href='https://apidocs.chargebee.com/docs/api/payment_parameters#payment_intent_additonal_info_sample'>here<a> to see sample json.
properties.name: additional_info

properties.label: First name
properties.hint: The first name of the billing contact.
properties.name: first_name

properties.label: Last name
properties.hint: The last name of the billing contact.
properties.name: last_name

properties.label: Email
properties.hint: The email address.
properties.name: email

properties.label: Company name
properties.hint: Name of the company.
properties.name: company

properties.label: City
properties.hint: Name of the city
properties.name: city

properties.label: State code
properties.hint: The ISO 3166-2 state/province code without the country prefix. Currently supported for USA, Canada and India
properties.name: state_code

properties.label: State
properties.hint: Name of the state.
properties.name: state

properties.label: Country code
properties.hint: 2-letter, ISO 3166 alpha-2 country code.
properties.name: country

properties.label: Zip
properties.hint: Zip or Postal code.
properties.name: zip

properties.label: Validation status

toggle_field.name: validation_status
toggle_field.label: Customer type
toggle_field.hint: Allowed vaalues are: not_validated, valid, partially_valid, invalid

properties.hint: The address verification status.
properties.name: validation_status

properties.label: Value
properties.hint: Use comma(',') separated value for 'in' and 'not_in' operator. e.g. value1,value2
properties.name: value

properties.hint: Use comma(',') separated value for 'in' and 'not_in' operator. e.g. value1,value2
properties.name: value

extended_input_schema.name: limit
extended_input_schema.label: Limit
extended_input_schema.hint: The number of resources to be returned. Default value is 10 and Maximum is 100

extended_input_schema.name: offset
extended_input_schema.label: Offset
extended_input_schema.hint: Determines your position in the list for pagination. To ensure that the next page is retrieved correctly, always set offset to the value of next_offset obtained in the previous iteration of the API call.

extended_input_schema.name: subscription_id
extended_input_schema.label: Subscription ID
extended_input_schema.hint: The display name used in web interface for identifying the subscription.

properties.label: Value
properties.hint: Use comma(',') separated value for 'in' and 'not_in' operator. e.g. value1,value2
properties.name: value

toggle_field.name: value
toggle_field.label: Value
toggle_field.hint: Allowed values are 'tax_exclusive', 'tax_inclusive'. Multiple values can be seperated using comma(','). e.g. tax_inclusive,tax_exclusive

toggle_field.name: value
toggle_field.label: Value
toggle_field.hint: Allowed values are 'paid', 'posted', 'payment_due', 'not_paid', 'voided', 'pending'. Multiple values can be seperated using comma(','). e.g. paid,posted

toggle_field.name: value
toggle_field.label: Value
toggle_field.hint: Allowed values are 'in_progress', 'exhausted', 'stopped', 'success'. Multiple values can be seperated using comma(','). e.g. in_progress,stopped

properties.label: Value
properties.hint: Use comma(',') separated value for 'in' and 'not_in' operator. e.g. value1,value2
